attributes.action: Reallocate the estimated £900,000 to paint BoJo's plane to a worthwhile cause.
attributes.additional_details:
I feel that this is an outrageous waste of money that would be far better used providing thousands of meal vouchers to under privileged children throughout the summer holidays. 

This is yet another incident that just goes to show how out of touch the Tory government are. We dont need a painted plane, we need more support for our most vulnerable children in society.
attributes.background: Various news sources have highlighted today that Boris Johnson, in the middle of a pandemic when millions are struggling to put food on the table, wants to spend nearly £1 million of tax payers money on painting his plane.

rejection.details:
By the time your petition was started, the plane had already been painted. It's not clear what action can be taken now.

We understand that you're also concerned about public services. You might like to sign and share one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318316
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315198
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327376
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073
